title: How to unsubscribe from YouTube TV
description: Here's how to cancel your YouTube TV subscription. There is no cancellation fee, and you'll have access to YouTube TV until the end of your current billing period. As of January 2026, the monthly price for YouTube TV's base plan is $82.99. New subscribers can sometimes find promotional offers. For example, there's a limited-time offer of $59.99 for the first two months ending March 17, 2026. Another offer is $72.99 per month for the first three months.

web.title: Cancel YouTube TV Subscription via Web
web.description:
Here's how to cancel your YouTube TV subscription via the web:

*   Go to tv.youtube.com in a web browser.
*   Sign in to your account.
*   Click your profile picture in the top right corner.
*   Select "Settings".
*   Click "Membership".
*   Click "Manage".
*   Select "Cancel membership".
*   Follow the prompts to confirm your cancellation.

seo_text: Cancel YouTube TV subscription, unsubscribe from YouTube TV, YouTube TV cancellation, end YouTube TV membership
